title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
Find a Cure Type Quest Act 1 Location Ravaged Beach Reward N/A

Find a Cure is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Find a Cure can be acquired after completing the Prologue: Escape the Nautiloid. Find a Cure tasks you with looking for a way to remove the parasite living within your brain. Completing Find a Cure will progress the story forward.

Baldur's Gate 3 Find a Cure Objectives

Find a way to remove the mind flayer parasite

We've escaped the Hells on the nautiloid and crashed somewhere back in the
